alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 17 at 7:32PM CST until November 18 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch, except up to 5 inches for northern Douglas county. * WHERE...Douglas County. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A gravity wave set up over the shore of northern Douglas county will cause locally higher snow amounts in the area. Highest amounts will be near the lake shore.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.
